modName: Hearthfire Items Chest - Materials for building your House
summary: This mod adds a chest to the forge near the Whiterun entrance and near the 3 Hearthfire houses. In this chest you can find all of the materials you need to build one of the 3 houses in Hearthfire. There are 2 versions available.
descriptionHtml:
[center]Description updated: Oct 8, 2014

Please use [url=http://forum.valixx-online.de]my forum[/url] for support. Thank you.[/center]

[center][url=http://twitter.com/ValixxOnline][img]http://valixx-online.de/wp-content/uploads/2017/04/twitter-small.png[/img][/url][url=http://facebook.com/ValixxOnline][img]http://valixx-online.de/wp-content/uploads/2017/04/facebookLogo-small.png[/img][/url][/center]

[center][color=#FF0000][b]Hearthfire required![/b][/color][/center]

This mod adds a chest to the forge near the Whiterun entrance and near the 3 Hearthfire houses. In this chest you can find all of the materials you need to build the 3 houses in Hearthfire.

[u]There are 2 versions available:[/u]

# Respawn version - If you take e.g. 100 glass out of the chest, the chest respawns after 30 in-game days. So you always have the items. But don't put your own stuff in there because after the 30 days it will be gone!

# Non-Respawn version - The chest will never respawn - You can put your own stuff in it. It will always be there.

Choose carefully.

[u]Items:[/u]

[list][*]2000x Clay
[*]2000x Glass
[*]2000x Goat Horns
[*]2000x Hinge
[*]2000x Iron Fittings
[*]2000x Lock
[*]2000x Nails
[*]2000x Quarried Stone
[*]2000x Straw
[/list]

Take a look at my other mods:
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/32927/]Monaghan Camp[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/31462/]Honey Moon Hall - Basement - Hideout[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/49037/?]Improved Lower Hrothgar[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/48478/?]Essential Housecarls[/url]
author: Valixx
